text: Daniel Boéri (born 1 March 1944) is a Monegasque sociologist and politician. He serves as a member of the National Council, and is the author of several books. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1944 births Category:Monegasque politicians Category:Knights of the Order of Cultural Merit (Monaco) Category:Members of the National Council (Monaco)
title: Daniel Boéri
